oai_dc:dc.dc:title: George R. Hall Steel engraving: "President, New Members of Cabinet & Others"
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Steel engraving depicting President Andrew Johnson, new members of his Cabinet, and other influential members of the U.S. Government. The twelve individuals depicted include Rep. Schuyler Colfax, Speaker of the House of Representatives; Sen. Thaddeus Stevens, Chairman of the Senate Committee on Finance; Hugh McCulloch, Secretary of the Treasury; James Speed, Attorney General of the United States; and others.
The engraver is George R. Hall (b. 1818); the publisher is unidentified.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hall, George R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Johnson, Andrew, 1808-1875; Portraits; Reconstruction (U.S. history, 1865-1877); Stevens, Thaddeus, 1792-1868; Colfax, Schuyler, 1823-1885; Speed, James, 1812-1887; Cabinet officers
Presidents; Cabinet officers; Steel engravings; Illustrations; Portraits
